Arsenal officials announced an agreement reached

Nasri, June 26, 1987 born, who just turned 24 years old, the functional attacking midfielder, also served as winger. Nasri began in Milabiwu club football career when he was only 8 years old, 1997 was phase Marseille scouts, football Colombia Jerseys Wholesale clubs in France and then to become a member. 2004/05 season, Nasri was promoted to first team that season; he played 25 times for Marseille, scoring 1 goal 2 assists, and since then Nasri corner in the French football outcrop temporarily. Four seasons in Marseille, Nasri played 166 times, scoring 12 goals in 27 assists; the summer of 2008, yearning for Europe's top clubs decided to leave Marseille Cheap Soccer Jersey , Samir Nasri, left France, and then chose Arsenal, Premier League Marseille club to pay 14 million pounds transfer fee. During the Arsenal, Nasri has been the team's starting from the 2008/09 season to 2010/11 season, the French star played a total of 124 times for Arsenal, scoring 27 goals 16 assists, which played last season 46 times, scoring 15 goals 5 assists, showing extremely well, even short-listed Premier League player of the season's official candidate list. Although the official season in the Premier League, losing to the best selection of Bell, but Nasri's performance is obvious, he gradually replace Cesc Fabregas, Arsenal has become the key players and even Arsenal fans as a %u201CYouth Soccer Jersey Double Tap "label. Unfortunately, Nasri outstanding performance, and did not substantially upgraded the team's strength, on the contrary paranoid manager Arsene Wenger's signings and team building ideas, so Arsenal's strength has been declining, in the club do not see any future Nasri, had to seek the transfer. Nasri leave the planning process of twists and turns, although the French star to leave his position again and again, but manager Arsenal Wenger has poured cold water again and again, that Arsenal will try to retain Nasri. Therefore, Nasri and Arsenal in numerous conflicts, the first round of the New Premier League season against Newcastle, refused Nasri debut, and then also missed the Champions League playoff game at home against Udinese. So far, Nasri after the New season starts, only played for Arsenal 1, Liverpool at home on the first stage of the game is regrettable that Nasri did not help Arsenal win, but the taste in the rain to a 0-2 defeat. It seems to defeat the game, so Nasri complete core leaving the team in the Champions League New Colombia Jersey playoff Udinese away before the war, the French players to negotiate with the club, the ultimate success of "escape" from Arsenal.
